name: Cloudsdale Dark
description:
A dark theme for cloudsdale.org.
Includes darker background color for /me messages.
As well as orange-ish color on the timecode for cloud owners.
additional_info:
First release:
Most colors has been applied, some are yet to be worked on.
version 2:
All colors present when in room have been applied, theme is now close to fully dark.
current cloud name centered
names greenified
